title: Ryan Hoffman from Chain of Strength and Quiet Panic Records
itunes:title: Ryan Hoffman from Chain of Strength and Quiet Panic Records
description:
Chain Of Strength. What a band and I have the pleasure of bringing on Ryan Hoffman who played guitar in the band (and Circle Storm!) to discuss all things Chain of Strength as well as his incredible label called Quiet Panic Records. We also discuss how he stays engaged and passionate about hardcore/punk all these years later. Enjoy! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
